definition: school official responsible for supervising the students (old)

sentences.english: In schools, there are many wardens who are in charge of the management of students.
sentences.chinese: 学校里有很多学监负责学生的管理工作。

sentences.english: A proctor's assistant at Oxford University or Cambridge University.
sentences.chinese: 牛津大学或剑桥大学里学监的助手。

sentences.english: And you have your own dean and master who are administrators for the university
sentences.chinese: 每个学院里都有学监和院长，他们共同管理着学校。

definition: scholar preparing for imperial examinations (in former times)
to give classes/to work as a teacher
school official responsible for supervising the students (old)
to supervise (troops)/to appoint (officers)/to select and assign
the first modern Chinese library established in 1898 by William A.P. Martin 丁韙良|丁韪良, becoming the foundation for Peking University library
Imperial College (or Academy), the highest educational body in imperial China
Imperial College of Supreme Learning, established in 124 BC, and the highest educational institute in ancient China until the Sui Dynasty
